mapper.sql: order_id, cardholder_name, cardholder_phone, cardholder_address, repay_card_num, express_send_address, express_com, express_send_num, express_send_date, gmt_create, gmt_modify
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO
loan_bank_card_send
( order_id, cardholder_name, cardholder_phone, cardholder_address, repay_card_num, express_send_address, express_com, express_send_num, express_send_date, gmt_create, gmt_modify )
VALUES
(#{item.orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.cardholderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cardholderPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cardholderAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.repayCardNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.expressSendAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.expressCom,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.expressSendNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.expressSendDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE
cardholder_name = VALUES(cardholder_name), cardholder_phone = VALUES(cardholder_phone), cardholder_address = VALUES(cardholder_address), repay_card_num = VALUES(repay_card_num), express_send_address = VALUES(express_send_address), express_com = VALUES(express_com), express_send_num = VALUES(express_send_num), express_send_date = VALUES(express_send_date), gmt_modify = VALUES(gmt_modify)

insert into loan_bank_card_send (order_id, cardholder_name, cardholder_phone, cardholder_address, repay_card_num, express_send_address, express_com, express_send_num, express_send_date, gmt_create, gmt_modify) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cardholderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardholderPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardholderAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{repayCardNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expressSendAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expressCom,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{expressSendNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expressSendDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

order_id,
cardholder_name,

cardholder_address,
repay_card_num,

mapper.update:
update loan_bank_card_send
cardholder_name = #{cardholderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cardholder_phone = #{cardholderPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cardholder_address = #{cardholderAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
repay_card_num = #{repayCardNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
express_send_address = #{expressSendAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
express_com = #{expressCom,jdbcType=TINYINT},
express_send_num = #{expressSendNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
express_send_date = #{expressSendDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modify = #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update loan_bank_card_send set cardholder_name = #{cardholderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cardholder_phone = #{cardholderPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cardholder_address = #{cardholderAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, repay_card_num = #{repayCardNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, express_send_address = #{expressSendAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, express_com = #{expressCom,jdbcType=TINYINT}, express_send_num = #{expressSendNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, express_send_date = #{expressSendDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modify = #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT a.order_id, case when b.cardholder_name is null then d.name else b.cardholder_name end AS cardholder_name, case when b.cardholder_phone is null then d.mobile else b.cardholder_phone end AS cardholder_phone,
case when b.cardholder_address is null then d.bank_card_transmit_address else b.cardholder_address end AS cardholder_address, b.repay_card_num, b.express_com, b.express_send_num, b.express_send_date, b.express_send_address FROM loan_process a LEFT JOIN loan_bank_card_send b ON a.order_id = b.order_id LEFT JOIN loan_order c ON c.id = a.order_id left join loan_customer d on d.id = c.loan_customer_id left join loan_base_info e on e.id = c.loan_base_info_id WHERE a.bank_card_send = 2 AND a.order_status =1
and d.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and d.id_card LIKE CONCAT('%',#{idCard},'%')
and e.bank in
#{item}
and e.partner_id in
#{item}
